oneWireWeather
Class StationConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  oneWireWeather.StationConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class StationConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

Supply the configuration information for this weather station. Read from a configuration file

Author:
Seth Cohen

getHardwarePollInterval

public long getHardwarePollInterval()
Return this configuration's hardware poll interval. This is how frequently the hardware acquisition thread will poll the configured hardware sensors.

Returns:
The hardware poll interval in milliseconds
